item.title: Purple belt / 4th Kyu
item.description: Basics Basic 1: Kette junzuki Basic 2: Kette gyakuzuki Basic 3: Kette junzuki no-tsukommi Basic 4: Kette gyakuzuki no-tsukommi Basic 6: Ushiro mawashi geri (spinning hook kick) Solo combinations Solo Combination 1: Mae geri/Mawashi geri/Sokuto/Ushiro geri/Gyakuzuku Solo Combination 2: Mae geri/Tobikomizuki/Ashi barai/Tobikomizuki/Haito Solo Combination 3: Yoko geri/Mawashi geri/Mawashi uraken/Gyakazuki Pairs Pair 1: attack
